alert.note: Alert for Granville; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vance, northwestern Warren and central Granville Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Oxford to near Kittrell. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Oxford, Norlina, Stovall, Middleburg, Steele Creek Marina & Campground, Kerr Lake, South Henderson, Wise and Dabney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
